central-textlogo: Verify that the Wikipedia logo is displayed correctly.
Check if the localized slogan 'The Free Encyclopedia' is displayed.
Ensure the logo and slogan are responsive and adjust properly on different screen sizes.
central-featured: Test that the top 10 language links are displayed and clickable.
Verify that the language names and article counts are correct.
Ensure that the language links open the correct Wikipedia editions.
Check if the language links are responsive and adjust properly on different screen sizes.
search-container: Test that the search input field is present and accepts text input.
Verify that the search button is clickable and triggers a search.
Ensure that the language dropdown is functional and changes the search language.
Check if the search suggestions dropdown appears and is populated with relevant suggestions.
Test that the search suggestions dropdown is dismissible.
lang-list-button: Verify that the language list button is clickable and expands the language list.
Check if the language list is responsive and adjusts properly on different screen sizes.
Test that the language list can be closed by clicking outside of it.
lang-list-content: Test that the language list is scrollable if it contains more languages than can be displayed.
Verify that the language list is sorted alphabetically.
Check if the language list contains all expected languages.
Test that clicking a language in the list changes the search language.
bookshelf: Verify that the bookshelf elements are displayed correctly.
Check if the bookshelf elements are responsive and adjust properly on different screen sizes.
app-badges: Test that the app badges are clickable and open the correct app store pages.
Verify that the app badges are responsive and adjust properly on different screen sizes.
footer: Test that the footer contains the correct links to other projects.
Verify that the footer links are clickable and open the correct pages.
Check if the footer is responsive and adjusts properly on different screen sizes.
